meanings.definition: The hours during which one is required to work.
meanings.sent1: My workhours are from 9 to 5 every day.
meanings.sent2: She calculated her workhours for the week to make sure she was paid correctly.
meanings.sent3: During my workhours, I sometimes daydream about being a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The workhours felt like a never-ending marathon of tasks and responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The workhours ticked by slowly, like a tired old clock.

meanings.definition: The amount of time spent working.
meanings.sent1: His workhours increased when the project deadline approached.
meanings.sent2: Tracking your workhours can help you manage your time more effectively.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could buy more workhours in a day to get everything done.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her workhours was like a shining beacon of productivity.
meanings.sent5: The workhours flew by when she was fully engaged in her tasks.
